title: when the game enters a new Season do you lose anything? Shards? Keys? chests? T.y.
body: Just wondering. This is my first season {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
no, you keep all of that

only thing that resets is rank

project yo skin shard. 

not a great loss.

You lose everything, champs, RP, IP, levels, rank, runes, skins, and sanity
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/925/494/218.png_large
In seriousness, no, you actually get more chests and shit cause you can get another chest on a champ again
It's the first season for everybody as far as those things go. No, you won't lose anything except for the worlds' teams' materials.
